ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Haste
ygData.msgSnippet: Rangers have a fair amount of ways to blow mana but still not as much as pal/sk. In my experience the hybrid +mana enhancement has let the rangers I ve grouped
ygData.messageBody:
Rangers have a fair amount of ways to blow mana but still not as much
as pal/sk. In my experience the hybrid +mana enhancement has let the
rangers I've grouped with pull longer w/o downtime for medding. Also
handy if the ranger is key snare and the group is chain pulling.


--- jhenders@... wrote:
> For Rangers, having extra mana is more questionable, but one thing it
> does allow is for them to dump wis and mana items for higher AC now,
> and
> that's probably worth something.
